SEARCH
Module proj.ingsw.rj
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
UserInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUIManager, VirtualView
public interface View
Standardization of all the methods that the Server uses to send requests, updates, error messages, etc Implemented by VirtualView (called by GameController) and CLI/GUI (Server -> Client, CLI/GUI -> User)

    Description
    void

  • Method Details

    • sendGenericResponse

      void sendGenericResponse(boolean response, String content)
      Gives feedback to the client about his last command
      Parameters:
      response - if command was successful/valid (needed by CLI/GUI to differentiate between positive and negative feedback

    • showCurrentPlayer

      void showCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayer)
      Shows the username of the current player
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - username of the current player

    • sendCheckedCoordinates

      void sendCheckedCoordinates(boolean valid, int[][] coordinates)
      Sends back the selected coordinates and gives feedback about its validity
      Parameters:
      valid - if the selection is valid
      coordinates - coordinates selected by the player

    • showRemovedCards

      void showRemovedCards(int[][] coordinates)
      Sends the coordinates of the cards successfully removed by the current player
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of the removed cards

    • showUpdatedBookshelf

      void showUpdatedBookshelf(Tile[][] bookshelf)
      Sends the updated bookshelf to the player after the insertion
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - updated bookshelf

    • showRefilledBoard

      void showRefilledBoard(BoardTile[][] boardTiles)
      Sends the newly refilled board after the calling of the fillBoard() method
      Parameters:
      boardTiles - refilled board

    • showCommonGoals

      void showCommonGoals(Goal[] commonGoals)
      Sends the game common goals details to the player
      Parameters:
      commonGoals - common goals of the game

    • showPrivateGoal

      void showPrivateGoal(PrivateGoal privateGoal)
      Sends to the player the details of his specific private goal
      Parameters:
      privateGoal - player-specific private goal

    • showScoreboard

      void showScoreboard(Scoreboard scoreboard)
      Updates all the players with the scoreboard at the end of the game
      Parameters:
      scoreboard - endgame scoreboard ordered by points

    • showToken

      void showToken(String content)
      Allows for the bonus point token to be taken by the first player who filled his bookshelf
      Parameters:
      content - message containing the username of the player
